fields.Keterangan:
Ia	 menyelesaikan	 sekolah	 Belanda	 di Solo	 pada 1937.	 Sumardi	 bekerja secara profesional	 sebagai	 pelukis,	 terutama	 untuk	 gambar- gambar	potret.	Di	saat	pelukis Amerika, W.	Stoyed,	berkunjung di Kraton Kasunanan	 Surakarta mengunjungi 1938, ia bertugas	 sebagai asisten pelukis untuk	menggambar	sejumlah	potret	keluarga	kraton. Dari pelukis	 asing	inilah Sumardi	belajar tentang	lukisan	gaya realisme Eropa	sebagai bagian	dari	perihal	teknik menggambar manusia.		

Sumardi	lalu	dikenal	sebagai	pelukis	realistik	dengan	pendekatan	 romantik	 (pengambilan	 sudut	 yang	 dramatik).	 Banyak	 sekali	 lukisan- lukisan	 yang	 bertema	 potret	 perempuan,	 dilukis	 dengan	 berkebaya	 tradisi	 Jawa.	 Goresannya	 lembut	 dan	 warna-warnanya	 memberi	 aksentuasi	khas,	dipengaruhi	kesan	cahaya	yang	masuk	pada	tubuh	sang	 figur.	 Lukisan-lukisan	 potret	 perempuan	 Jawa	 ini	 menjadi	 identitasnya	 yang	paling	kuat.	
Sebagian	karya-karyanya	telah	menghiasi	dinding	Istana	Presiden	 Republik	Indonesia.	Salah	satunya	adalah	karya	yang	masuk	dalam	buku	 koleksi	 Presiden	 Sukarno	 buku	 IV	 1957.	 Karya	 Putri	 Solo	 dan	 Gadis	 Mengurai	 Rambut,	 Wanita	 di	 Pantai	 Laut,	 dan	 Wanita	 Pakai	 Selendang	 Hijau	menjadi koleksi	Sukrano.	 Ia sering menggelar pameran bersama	 di Solo, Semarang, Surabaya,	 dan	 Jakarta,	 terutama	 di	 bawah	 naungan	 kelompok	 Himpunan	 Budaya	 Surakarta	 (HBS).	 Di	 samping	 itu,	 karya- karyanya	juga	kerap	menghiasi	sampul	majalah	Varia di	dekade	1960-an.
fields.Description: Born in Solo, Central Java, Sumardi worked as a professional painter, particularly portraits drawing, after he finished the Dutch school in 1937. When an American artist painter W. Stoyed visited the Sunan's palace in Surakarta in 1938, to make the potrait drawings for the Sunan's family members, Sumardi worked for him as his assistant. From this foreign artist , Sumardi learned a lot about the Eroupean realism particularly the technique of drawing human anatomy. Sumardi was then known as a realistic artist with an exclusive romantic touch. Some of his works have decorated the walls of the state palaces in Jakarta and Bogor. One of his works was included in the book of the President Soekarno Paintings Collections Book IV 1957 ( Compiled by Lee Man Fong). He had participated in many paintings exhibitions in Solo, Semarang, Surabaya, and Jakarta, mainly under the arrangement of the Surakarta Cultural Center (Himpunan Budaya Surakarta)

fields.Keterangan: Pelukis kelahiran Aceh, sekitar tahun 1920. Ia tercatat sebagai salah satu pelukis modern pertama dari Aceh, sebelum kemudian muncul Chairul Bahri, AD Pirous, Lian Sahar dan sebagainya. Anaknya, Suharno Manaf yang dilahirkan di Palembang, mewarisi potensi melukis Abdul Manaf.

fields.Keterangan: Pada 1914 Romero pindah ke Mexico City dan bekerja sebagai ilustrator pada terbitan berkala El Heraldo de Mexico, Excelsior, El Universal Ilustrado dan Revista. Ia mulai aktif berpameran di dalam dan luar negeri pada tahun 1920-1930.  salah satu pameran pentingnya adalah saat Ia mengikuti Venice Bienalle di tahun 1958. Ia pernah menerima beasiswa dari  Guggenheim untuk belajar di New York pada 1940. Dalam karirnya Orozco dikenal sebagai seniman yang juga aktif dalam pendirian berbagai institusi di Mexico seperti  Galeria de Arte Moderno dan Sekolah Lukis dan Patung Nasional "La Esmeralda".  Ia juga sempat menjadi direktur dari Modern Art Museum of Mexico City. Ia merupakan peraih penghargaan  nasional bidang Sains dan Seni tahun 1980.
fields.Description:
Carlos Orozco Romero (September 3, 1896 – March 29, 1984) was a Mexican cartoonist and painter who co-founded several cultural institutions in Mexico, including the Escuela Nacional de Pintura, Escultura y Grabado "La Esmeralda". His work was recognized with membership in the Academia de Artes and the Salón de la Plástica Mexicana, and in 1980, with Mexico’s Premio Nacional de Arte (National Art Prize).

Orozco Romero was born in Guadalajara to a tailor named Jesús Orozco, who was not very literate in the arts but nonetheless allowed his son to pursue the craft. He hired a painter named Luis de la Torre, an eccentric who traveled Mexico to paint, taking his guitar and bottle of tequila along with his art supplies. The father thought that De la Torre, who focused on experience rather than theory, would be a better teacher to his son than a formal academy. Orozco Romero spent significant amounts of time reinterpreting still lifes and painting in the surrounding countryside.[1] He also studied for a while with a painter named José Vizcarra.

At age thirteen, Orozco Romero left home and supported himself by drawing cartoons.[1] He became a member of the Centro Bohemio, an organization of artists, intellectuals and militants founded by José Guadalupe Zuno, through which he met David Alfaro Siqueiros, Xavier Guerrero, and Carlos Stahl .[2][3][4] At age sixteen, he left Guadalajara for Mexico City because of that city’s role in the Mexican muralism movement.

In Mexico City, he met and married María Marín, who remained his wife until his death. Orozco Romero met Marín through José Guadalupe Zuno, who was courting María’s older sister Lupe. The match was not approved by the girl’s family, so Orozco Romero acted as a go-between, which allowed him to meet María. The couple married in 1920, with eight pesos loaned by an aunt. They initially lived in one of the rooms of the Museo Regional de Guadalajara, lent to them by Ixca Farías.

Shortly after his marriage, the artist received a scholarship from the state of Jalisco to study in Europe. He traveled in Belgium and France and lived for a time in Madrid, where he met painter Rafael Alberto and Mexican writers Luis Gonzaga Urbina and Alfonso Reyes.  He did not stay long in Europe, however, as his wife was pregnant and he was homesick for Mexico. He returned to live in Guadalajara in 1923, and he and María both studied engraving with Peruvian artist José Sabogal. Years later, their daughter Gabriela found one of her mother’s plates among the anonymous items of the Metropolitan Museum of Art in New York.

Orozco Romero’s later travels included seven months working and exhibiting in New York on a Guggenheim Fellowship; later in 1957 he visited Spain, Italy, France and Switzerland.

Orozco Romero died at age 87 from pneumonia and malnutrition. He left behind his wife María and his daughters Gabriela and Arcelia.

fields.Keterangan: Dilahirkan di Leiden, Belanda, 1908. Belajar melukis di Vrije Academie van Beeldende Kunsten di Den Haag. Kemudian meneruskan studinya ke Inggris dan Paris. Pada tahun 1937 ia berlayar ke Indonesia, untuk bertemu dengan saudaranya di Bogor. Di kota ini, setelah melongok Buitenzorg Paleis, ia mulai sangat tertarik Indonesia. Ia lalu ke Bali dan berjumpa dengan keluarga pelukis WG Hofker. Tahun 1939 ia pameran tunggal di Bataviasche Kunstkring. Setelah ditawan oleh jepang tahun 1942, ia kembali ke Belanda pada 1945. Tahun 1972 karyanya dipamerkan di Rijksmuseum Amsterdam dalam juluk “Nederlandse schilders en tekenaars in de Oost 17de - 20ste eeuw”.

Ir. Soekarno adalah Presiden pertama Republik Indonesia yang menjabat pada periode 1945–1967.[5]:11, 81 Ia memainkan peranan penting dalam memerdekakan bangsa Indonesia dari penjajahan Belanda. Ia adalah Proklamator Kemerdekaan Indonesia (bersama dengan Mohammad Hatta) yang terjadi pada tanggal 17 Agustus 1945. Soekarno adalah yang pertama kali mencetuskan konsep mengenai Pancasila sebagai dasar negara Indonesia dan ia sendiri yang menamainya.
Ketika dilahirkan, Soekarno diberikan nama Kusno oleh orangtuanya.Namun karena ia sering sakit maka ketika berumur sebelas tahun namanya diubah menjadi Soekarno oleh ayahnya. Nama tersebut diambil dari seorang panglima perang dalam kisah Bharata Yudha yaitu Karna.[5][7] Nama "Karna" menjadi "Karno" karena dalam bahasa Jawa huruf "a" berubah menjadi "o" sedangkan awalan "su" memiliki arti "baik".
Bung Karno adalah presiden pertama Indonesia yang juga dikenal sebagai arsitek alumni dari Technische Hoogeschool te Bandoeng (sekarang ITB) di Bandung dengan mengambil jurusan teknik sipil dan tamat pada tahun 1926.

Kiboh Kodama lahir di Hiroshima pada tahun 1898. Ia mulai belajar melukis dari Kawai Gyokudo, seorang pelukis Nihonga, pada tahun 1918. Setelah karyanya terpilih dalam pameran bergengsi “Teikoku Bijutsu-in” pada tahun 1921 dan mendapatkan penghargaan dalam pameran tersebut pada tahun 1928, ia menjadi salah satu tokoh besar dalam dunia seni rupa Jepang pada masanya. Karya-karya Kiboh Kodama kebanyakan memang berupa lukisan pemandangan, namun ia juga bereksplorasi dengan media tinta dan gaya abstrak. Selain itu, ia juga bereksperimen dengan cat minyak dan cat air. Ia sempat tinggal di Eropa selama setahun pada tahun 1957. Sekembalinya ke Jepang, ia bergabung sebagai anggota di Japan Art Institute pada tahun 1959. Ia mendapatkan penghargaan of Order of the Rising Sun (Kyokujitsu-sho) kelas tiga dari kaisar Jepang pada tahun 1970, setahun sebelum ia wafat.

Lahir di Paron, Ngawi, Jawa Timur. Ia pindah ke Surabaya sekitar 1920-an, lalu bertemu pelukis Gerald Pieter Adolfs. Tahun 1932 pindah ke Malang, Jawa Timur, dan bertemu pelukis Willem van der Does. Dari merekalah Koempoel belajar melukis. Ia belajar sekolah teknik di Burgerlijk Ambacht School, Surabaya. Sejak 1930 ia telah menggelar pameran dan yang terakhir berlangsung pada 1986 di Surabaya.

Diperkirakan aktif di tahun 1950-60an. Kecenderungan karyanya kubistik, gaya yang besar di lingkungan seni rupa Bandung pada masa itu. Berdasarkan tulisan yang terdapat di koleksi istana besar kemungkinan praktik Kosnan terjadi di Surabaya dan mulai mendapat perhatian pencinta seni lokal. Hal ini ditandai dengan diberikannya satu lukisan Kosnan kepada Presiden Sukarno sebagai hadiah oleh Gubernur Akademi Angkatan Laut Kol. Pel. RS Subijakto. Karya Kosnan kini tergantung di Istana Bogor dan Bali.

Lim Wasim was born in Bandung Year 1929, from a Chinese family who opened a restaurant. Wasim is interested in painting and short-sighted to artists in Bandung, for example: Sudjana Kerton, Mochtar Apin and Abedy. In 1950 Wasim studied at the Central Art Institute of Beijing, China. For six years he studied there and then got a teaching assignment as a three-year association at the Xian Art College, Xian City.

In 1960, Lim Wasim lived in Jakarta and came into contact with the Yin Hua organization. An organization of Chinese painters founded by Lee Man Fong in 1955 and headquartered in Prinsenpark (now Lokasari), Jakarta. In 1962, Lee Man Fong along with Lim Wasim received official duty from Bung Karno as a palace painter to replace Dullah. The 1965 Tragedy event has made Lee Man Fong go to Singapore, so Lim Wasim is on duty alone as a palace painter. Lim served in the transition period of the Old Order government until the New Order era of Suharto, 1968.
Lim received many international awards, for example: in 1981, 1982, and 1985, he received an award from Italy. In 1975 his name is widely included in the biography of world artists award. Until 1995 Wasim was appointed professor at the Liu Haishu Arts Institute, Shanghai. In 1998 she was awarded World Lifetime Achievement from International Parliement, USA. Lim Wasim died on 28 August 2004.

In 1962, Lee Man Fong along with Lim Wasim received official duty from Bung Karno as a palace painter to replace Dullah. The 1965 Tragedy event has made Lee Man Fong go to Singapore, so Lim Wasim is on duty alone as a palace painter. Lim served in the transition period of the Old Order government until the New Order era of Suharto, 1968.
Lim received many international awards, for example: in 1981, 1982, and 1985, he received an award from Italy. In 1975 his name is widely included in the biography of world artists award. Until 1995 Wasim was appointed professor at the Liu Haishu Arts Institute, Shanghai. In 1998 she was awarded World Lifetime Achievement from International Parliement, USA. Lim Wasim died on 28 August 2004.

fields.Keterangan: Rusli (lahir di Medan, Desember 1912 - meninggal di Jakarta, 11 Mei 2005 pada umur 93 tahun) adalah seorang pelukis Indonesia. Ia merupakan pelukis senior yang sejajar dan seangkatan dengan pelukis Affandi, Sudjojono dan Hendra Gunawan. Rusli juga dikenal sebagai tokoh pembaharu seni lukis Indonesia. Di samping juga konsistensinya untuk mempertahankan prinsip-prinsip dalam berkesenian, yakni kesederhanaan, baik dalam lukisan maupun dirinya

S. Toetoer menempuh pendidikan sekolah dasar di Hollandsch-Inlandsche School (HIS), dan mengawali karirnya di bidang konstruksi. Karena merasa pekerjaan yang cocok dengannya adalah menggambar, ia pindah ke kantor berita Aneta (Algemeen Nieuws en Telegraaf Agent Schap) pada tahun 1929, kemudian pindah ke kantor reklame Linto pada tahun 1938. Dua tahun setelahnya, ia membuka perusahaan reklame sendiri yang diberi nama Rembrandt Studio di Molenvliet West (sekarang Jl. Gajah Mada). S. Toetoer adalah anggota dari Persatuan Ahli Gambar Indonesia (PERSAGI) dan lukisan-lukisannya banyak menggambarkan kehidupan sehari-hari.

fields.Nama: Sauw Swie Thjing Alias Chris Suharso
fields.Keterangan: Siauw Swie Thjing, a self-taught artist who became an assistant painter Lee Man Fong to complete Ramayana painting at the Hotel Indonesia in Jakarta in 1963. His love for Balinese landscape and watercolor carried on, peaking in the 1990s, as is evident in the 1997 work Pura di Pedalaman (Pura in the Wilderness), which depicts a Balinese Hindu temple. The detailed depiction of the pura, framed by thick forest and banana tree, gives a sense of elegant tranquility, especially through rays of light made by using water to dilute colors. His Pasar Antik (Antiques Market, 1998) was made when Suharso was 67 years old and suffering from the cancer that would claim his life by 1999. The painting shows no weakness. It is vibrant, made with the energy of a teenager, showing the intricate details of an antique shop, with intelligent lighting and strong impression. The same can be seen in Tari Pandan (1996).

fields.Keterangan:
Itō was born in the Fukagawa district of Tokyo. After unwise investments bankrupted his father's business, he was forced to drop out of elementary school in the third grade and became a live-in apprentice at a printing shop. It was in this manner that he became interested in printing techniques and also in the arts.
In 1911, Itō was accepted as an apprentice under Kaburagi Kiyokata, (who gave him the pseudonym of "Shinsui") and issued his first woodblock print the following year. His talent was soon apparent, and from the following year, his paintings were entered in public exhibitions.
In 1912, his works were first shown by the Tatsumi gakai ("Southeast Painting Society") and later works were displayed by the Kyodokai ("Homeland Society"), the Nihon bijutsuin (Japan Art Institute), and in the government sponsored Bunten show. His works were received with much praise by art critics, and his reputation was soon made. His early works won numerous awards, and he accepted a post at the Tokyo Nichi Nichi Shimbun to supply illustrations for newspapers.

Born in Rome on January 29th, 1929. From his father - also a well known painter - he inherited the love for art and his great taste in colors.

He studied at the Rome School of Art where he won his teachers; esteem. After having finished his studies, he travelled in ITaly and France, painting from nature and taking active part in the artist life of the most important towns of those Countries. He paints and exhibits successfully in Venice, Naples, Milan and Paris.

His works show a talent matured through study, research and conscientious dedication. Though constantly searching for new expression in art, Simonetti always stick to the fundamental virtues of painting: drawing, perspective and color.

His landscapes and marines, his portraits of Venice and Paris meet with everybody's taste for their well balanced technique and the gracious sense of poetry, which pervades them.

fields.Keterangan:
Salah satu pelukis Maestro terkenal Indonesia " Soedibio " lahir di Madiun, Jawa Timur, 17 Juni 1912. Belajar melukis dilakoninya secara otodidak. Semasa hidup aktif di berbagai organisasi kesenian, diantaranya pada tahun 1940 bergabung menjadi anggota PERSAGI (Persatuan Ahli Gambar Indonesia) di Jakarta, lalu pada tahun 1946 ikut mendirikan Seniman Indonesia Muda (SIM) di Madiun, Jawa Timur.

Kemudian pada tahun 1967 menjadi anggota Sanggar Puring di Surabaya, Jawa Timur, serta pada tahun 1970 menjadi anggota Himpunan Budaya Surakarta (HBS) di Solo, Jawa Tengah. Pernah bekerja bersama Trisno Sumarjo di Jawatan Kereta Api (1942) di kota asalnya, Madiun, Jawa Timur. Pada jamannya, ia di kenal sebagai satu-satunya pelukis potret, yang sanggup membuat potret orang tanpa model. Lukisan tentang pengalamannya di tahanan Belanda di Yogyakarta pada tahun 1949 adalah salah satu bukti kemahirannya tersebut.

Selain melukis potret orang, ia juga mahir melukis pemandangan alam. Rumah-rumah orang di desa dan pohon nyiur berkipas-kipas daun bersatu dalam satu ayunan tenang dengan galengan-galengan sawah di sekitarnya, di gambarkan secara tepat olehnya. Keunikan lain yang dimilikinya yang membedakan dirinya dengan pelukis lain adalah, ia selalu membuat perubahan pada gaya lukisannya yang berubah dengan drastis sesuai kisah hidupnya.

Lukisannya pada zaman revolusi bernuansa kelam dan menunjukkan kekerasan. Kemudian setelah sempat menghilang selama 15 tahun dari dunia seni rupa karena persoalan pribadi, ia akhirnya kembali lagi, namun dengan gaya lukisan yang lebih lembut.

Pelukis naturalis Indonesia yang hidup di era Mooi Indie  ini, lahir di Plaju, Palembang Sumatera Selatan, pada tahun 1889. Orang tuanya berasal dari Semarang, Jawa Tengah. Mulai melukis sejak usia 10 tahun. Semasa kecil senang menggambar ulang karya-karya Raden Saleh Syarief Bustaman yang diperoleh melalui buku-buku, majalah atau foto-foto. Inilah yang menyebabkannya akrab dengan dunia seni lukis.
 Mendapat pendidikan seni lukis di Kweekshool Bukittinggi, Sumatera Barat, dan sempat belajar dengan pelukis Belanda bernama Van Dick di sekolah tersebut. Setelah selesai, kemudian menjadi guru di almamaternya. Karya-karya Wakidi dikenal luas oleh publik penikmat seni di Sumatera Barat, manakala pelukis ini untuk pertama kalinya memamerkan tidak kurang dari 15 karyanya pada tahun 1920 di Bukittinggi. Saat perang kemerdekaan berkecamuk di Ranah Minang, Wakidi memilih menetap dan mengajar di INS Kayutanam, pimpinan Mohammad Syafei.
Setelah Republik Indonesia merdeka, ia mengajar di SMA Landbouw dan SMA Birugo Bukittinggi. Selain itu banyak pula tawaran yang datang kepada pelukis Wakidi, diantaranya dari Abu Hanifah, Menteri Pendidikan dan Pengajaran, menawarinya untuk menjadi kepala jawatan kebudayaan, bahkan presiden RI pertama Soekarno pernah pula menawarinya sebagai pelukis istana, semua ditolak secara halus dengan alasan banyak menyita waktunya untuk melukis.

Lahir di Illinois, Amerika Serikat 1893, dan meninggal di California, 1970. Ia lulusan perguruan Akademi Seni Evanston, serta mendapat bimbingan khusus dari William Meritt Chase. Karirnya pernah terhambat ketika ia bertugas sebagai anggota angkatan laut pada masa Perang Duia I. Setelah perang usai ia memilih hidup di Concarneau, Prancis sebagai pelukis. Setelah hidup lama di Prancis, ia kembali ke Amerika Serikat, dan karyanya yang bergaya impresonis mendapat julukan “California Style”. Lukisannya telah dipamerkan di berbagai galeri di Amerika dan Eropa.
fields.Description:
An impressionist landscape painter, especially known for coastal scenes of the Monterey Peninsula, Arthur Hill Gilbert was born in Mount Vernon, Illinois, on June 10, 1894. 
He graduated from the Evanston Academy in 1913 and then spent two years at Northwestern University. In 1917 he attended the United States Naval Academy Officer's School at Annapolis and then served abroad. Following his military stint, he moved to Southern California around 1920. 
After studying in Los Angeles at the Otis Art Institute, he had further training in Paris and London. The artist won the Hallgarten Prize at the National Academy of Design in 1929 for his Monterey Oaks. The next year he won the Ranger and the Murphy prizes. 
In 1930 he settled in Monterey from where his paintings won many awards in California shows during the 1920s and 1930s. During his later years, Gilbert spent most of his time on his ranch near Stockton where he died on April 28, 1970. 
He was elected an Associate of the National Academy of Design in 1930. His memberships include the California Art Club, Carmel Art Association, Laguna Beach Art Association, Bohemian Club, San Francisco, and Salmagundi Club, New York.

fields.Keterangan: Lahir pada menjelang 1920. Tjio Tek Djien disebut sebagai fasilitator seni lukis pada tahun 1950-an. Tjio memang terkenal sebagai promotor seni lukis yang mendirikan studio di kawasan Tjideng, Jakarta. Di sini ia mempekerjakan banyak pelukis dari seluruh Indonesia untuk berkarya secara profesional. Studio Tjio lalu mendistribusikan karya-karya para peluks ke berbagai galeri dan artshop di seluruh Indonesia. Dalam jajaran lukisan yang didistribusikan itu terdapat nama yang kelak terkenal, seperti Lim Wasim, Trubus dan sebagainya. Pergaulannya dengan para pelukis menyebabkan Tjio kembali giat melukis. Ia adalah rekan dekat Presiden Sukarno dalam urusan koleksi-mengoleksi seni.

Antonio lahir di distrik Ermita di Manila, Filipina. Ia pada mulanya hidup dan bekerja di Florida dan California, Amerika Serikat, hingga pada suatu waktu hatinya tertarik untuk mengeksplorasi pulau-pulau di Samudra Pasifik sebagai sumber inspirasinya seperti pelukis Paul Gauguin, José Miguel Covarrubias dan yang lainnya sebelum dirinya. Ia berencana untuk pergi ke Tahiti, tetapi nasib membawanya ke Hawaii, Jepang dan Kamboja, dimana ia menjadi tamu kehormatan Pangeran Norodom Sihanouk.

In early 1942 Smit was transferred to the infantry in East Java, but was soon captured by the invading Japanese forces. He spent three and a half years in forced labor camps building roads, bridges, and railways on the Burma Railway in Thailand, and Burma. After the Japanese capitulation in August 1945, Smit convalesced in Bangkok until January 1946. After being stationed in Denpasar, Bali as a staff writer for the infantry, he returned to the Topographical Service in Batavia in September. Until its discontinuation in 1950, he remained employed at this service, eventually becoming head of the drawing department, but in his spare time he criss-crossed Java as a painter and in October 1948 had his first exhibition in Batavia/Jakarta. After Indonesian Independence on December 27, 1949, all Dutch nationals had to choose between Dutch or Indonesian citizenship within two years. Smit briefly considered emigrating to South Africa, but decided to stay; he became an Indonesian citizen late in 1951. In the following years he taught graphics and lithography at the Institut Teknologi Bandung in West Java.

fields.Keterangan: Omar Yahya dikenal sebagai pelukis realis yang banyak merekam kehidupan perempuan di Sumatera Barat. Ia memang dilahirkan di Sumatera Barat pada tahun 1920-an, dan dianggap sebagai bagian kecil dari eksponen yang meluaskan “mashab Wakidi” di Sumatera Barat, yang lebih banyak menggarap tema pemandangan alam. Omar lama bertahan di tempat kelahirannya, walaupun kemudian bermuhibah ke Jawa Tengah. Di sini ia melukis segala rupa, dari candi-candi tua sampai buah-buahan. Sebagian besar lukisannya apik, “Mooi Indie” dan beres, sehingga dikoleksi oleh Presiden Sukarno. Ia termasuk jarang mengikuti pameran, sehingga riwayatnya tidak terlalu dikenal.

Pelukis dan grafikus ternama Inggris yang lahir pada 1880. Ia juga dikenal sebagai ilustrator dan ahli litografi. Gaya dan teknik lukisan cat-airnya memberikan gaya tersendiri dalam sejarah seni lukis Inggris, sehingga karyanya melahirkan mashab “British Art”. Prestasi dan pengaruh ini menyebabkan ia diangkat sebagai President of the Royal Society of Painter in Water-colour, dari 1936 sampai 1956. Kepeloporannya dalam seni lukis menghasilkan gelar “Sir”, penghargaan tertinggi dari Kerajaan Inggris. Karya Flynt tersebar di berbagai museum di Eropa Barat dan Amerika. Ia wafat pada1969.
fields.Description:
Flint was born in Edinburgh on 4 April 1880 and was educated at Daniel Stewart's College and then Edinburgh Institution.From 1894 to 1900 Flint apprenticed as a lithographic draughtsman while taking classes at the Royal Institute of Art, Edinburgh. From 1900 to 1902 he worked as a medical illustrator in London while studying part-time at Heatherley's Art School. He furthered his art education by studying independently at the British Museum. He was an artist for The Illustrated London News from 1903 to 1907, and produced illustrations for editions of several books, including H Rider Haggard's King Solomon's Mines (1907 edition), W. S. Gilbert's Savoy Operas (1909), Sir Thomas Malory's Le Morte d'Arthur (1910–1911)[6] and Chaucer's The Canterbury Tales (1912).

Flint was elected president of Britain's Royal Society of Painters in Watercolours (now the Royal Watercolour Society) in 1936 to 1956, and knighted in 1947.

During visits to Spain, Flint was impressed by Spanish dancers, and he depicted them frequently throughout his career. He enjoyed considerable commercial success but little respect from art critics, who were disturbed by a perceived crassness in his eroticized treatment of the female figure.

Flint was active as an artist until his death in London on 30 December 1969.

fields.Keterangan: Juga dituliskan dengan ejaan Xiao Chang. Ia dilahirkan di Xianmen, propinsi Fujian, Tiongkok pada 1911. Belajar melukis dari orang tuanya, seorang pelukis profesional. Mungkin karena pandai bertutur bijak, ketika belia ia dijuluki “Pendeta Kecil” oleh lingkungannya, dengan panggilan “Pudu Shannong”. Pada tahun 1929 Siauw ke Indonesia sebagai imigran. Kepandaiannya dalam menulis menyebabkan ia diterima sebagai wartawan majalah warga peranakan. Bersamaan dengan itu ia terus melukis dalam gaya chinese painting. Ia memilih bermukim di Cirebon, tempat pertama yang ia injak ketika datang ke Indonesia. Setelah karyanya dikoleksi Presiden Sukarno, ia mantap menjadi Warga Negara Indonesia.
No detailed information available.
fields.Description: No detailed information available.

fields.Keterangan: Moleh dilahirkan di dusun Padang Tegal, Ubud, 1918. Dan meninggal di dusun yang sama pada 1997. Belajar melukis pertama kali kepada Tjokorda Ginceng di Peliatan. Tahun 1936 ia bergabung dengan Pita Maha yang dipimpin Rudolf Bonnet. Moleh dianggap pelukis yang menonjol. Nama sebenarnya adalah Molog. Namun oleh Bonnet diganti menjadi Moleh, sebagai pelafalan dari kata molig (Belanda) yang artinya “sintal”, atau seksi. Kala muda tubuh lelaki ini memang dikabarkan gemuk, sintal, sehingga nampak lucu dan “seksi”.

Dilahirkan di banjar Pekandelan Kelod, Ubud, Bali, 1941. Pendidikannya hanya sampai sekolah dasar. Namun demikian reputasi melukisnya sangat menonjol, sehingga ia memenangkan lomba melukis. Munut kemudian belajar melukis di perkumpulan Golongan Pelukis Ubud asuhan Rudolf Bonnet, menjelang 1960. Karyanya menarik perhatian, sehingga mudah dijual dan menghadirkan kecukupan hidup. Ia lalu membuka Galeri Munut di Ubud, yang beroperasi sampai tengah 1990-an. Karyanya banyak disimpan kolektor penting, seperti Adam Malik dan berbagai museum utama di Bali.

Bernama lengkap Federico Cantu Garza. Lahir di Nuervo Leon, Mexico 1907dan wafat di Los Angeles, Amerika Serikat, 1989. Ayahnya seorang dokter, sementara ibunya penulis. Kehidupan di tengah suasana intelektualistik mempengaruh sifat kesenilukisannya. Isterinya, Luz Fabila, berteman dengan pelukis ternama Frida Kahlo. Sedangkan Ferderico sendiri bersahabat dengan Andre Breton, pengembang surealisme. Pada suatu masa ia hidup di Los Angeles dan New York. Namanya terkenal sebagai pembuat mural dalam ukuran serba besar. Dan lukisannya dipajang di Tate Gallery, London serta MOMA (Museum of Modern Art) New York.
fields.Description:
Cantú was born to María Luiza Garza,a novelist, and Adolfo Cantú, a journalist who opposed the Porfirio Díaz regime. He was born shortly before the Mexican Revolution and spent his childhood split between Nuevo León and San Antonio, Texas, with the family moving back permanently to Mexico in the 1920s.] He was born on March 3, 1907 in Monterrey, but later in life, he changed his birth year to 1908 and his birthplace to Cadereyta Jiménez, where his family was originally from.
In 1922, at age 14, Cantú entered the Escuela de Pintura al Aire Libre, which was directed by Alfredo Ramos Martínez.He had contact with the growing Mexican muralism movement and briefly studied fresco painting under Diego Rivera in 1924.
From 1924 to 1934, he traveled and lived in Europe and the United States. He first went to live in Paris on Rue Delambre in Montparnasse, being only sixteen years old. During his time in Europe he met various artists of the avant garde of the time, including Picasso, Alfonso Reyes, poet César Vallejo and sculptor Mateo Hernández. He studied with sculptor Jose de Creeft.When he lived in Paris, he gathered a collection of drawings called the "Paris Collection" by his son Federico Cantú Fabila , FCF.  However, during his time there, he created over two chests of drawings made at Le Grande Chaumière. These chests were lost.
In 1929, he married his first wife, Luz Fabila Montes de Oca.
His times in the United States were short periods. He left Europe for Mexico in 1934. In the 1930s, he joined a group of painters with the Inés Amor gallery but soon after, established a studio in New York, as friends of his from Montparnasse were there to escape the Second World War.
He died on January 29, 1989. His remains are at the foot of his mural Dios Padre y crucifixion (1959) at the chapel of the Universidad Intercontinental in Tlalpan.

fields.Keterangan: was a prominent Mexican painter. His large frescoes helped establish the Mexican mural movement in Mexican art. Between 1922 and 1953, Rivera painted murals in, among other places, Mexico City, Chapingo, Cuernavaca, San Francisco, Detroit, and New York City. In 1931, a retrospective exhibition of his works was held at the Museum of Modern Art in New York. Rivera had a volatile marriage with fellow Mexican artist Frida Kahlo.

fields.Keterangan:
Joan van Gent was painter of very nice still lifes. He had a very recognisable style in terms of composition and subject matter, his paintings have therefore become increasingly popular, especially in recent year, among an ever growing group of enthusiasts and collectors in the Netherlands and abroad. 

Painter Johannes Baptist Nicolaas van Gent, 
signed his paintings with 'Joan B.N. v. Gent', 'J.B.N. v. Gent' or with 'P. Rosier'.

fields.Keterangan: No detailed information available

Lahir di Padang Panjang, Sumatera Barat 1923. Belajar seni secara formal pertama kali di Universitaire Leergang voor Opleiding van Tekenlelaren, yang sekarang dikenal sebagai jurusan seni rupa Institut Teknologi Bandung. Pada tahun-tahun kemudian ia memperdalam seni rupa di Amsterdam, Paris dan Jerman. Perjuangan seninya dimulai sejak muda, ketika ia bergabung dengan organisasi kesenian Gelanggang, pada usia 23 tahun. Sejak 1955 ia banyak kali mengikuti pameran di Indonesia dan berbagai negara. Selain melukis ia juga mencipta seni grafis. Pengabdiannya yang panjang menghasilkan gelar Guru Besar. Mochtar Apin meninggal di Bandung pada 1994.
fields.Description:
Born in Padang Panjang, West Sumatera, 23 December 1923, Mochtar Apin is regarded as one of Indonesia’s modern painting maestro.  
He was co-founder of the Gelanggang Seniman Muda (Arena of Independent Artists) movement in Jarkarta in 1946 and a member of the Bandung School. 
Alongside other painters, intellectuals and poets, he advocated a universalist ideal for culture, advocating the creation of art concerns that could communicate to people of all backgrounds. Mochtar was well travelled and for seven years of his life, from 1951 to 1959, he took the initiative to journey around Europe looking at art and visiting museums.

fields.Keterangan: Painter Nguyen Van Binh (born June 4, 1917, died February 18, 2004 in Hanoi) was born in Phu Xuyen district, Hanoi city. He graduated from Indochina Fine Arts College course XII (1938 - 1943) and became a member of the Vietnam Fine Arts Association since 1957.
fields.Description: Painter Nguyen Van Binh (born June 4, 1917, died February 18, 2004 in Hanoi) was born in Phu Xuyen district, Hanoi city. He graduated from Indochina Fine Arts College course XII (1938 - 1943) and became a member of the Vietnam Fine Arts Association since 1957.

fields.Keterangan:
Ermogene Miraglia was born in a neighborhood of Naplesancient, from Luigi Miraglia, doctor, and from Teresa Costarelli, musician and virtuoso of the mandolin. Hermogenes is the first of six children. At the age of thirteen he lost his mother. The father raised his six children, with the help of two unmarried sisters, to the point of leading them all to graduation. Ermogene Miraglia became a doctor of agricultural science at the University of Portici. Immediately after graduation he won two competitions, one as a railway inspector and one as a school principal. 
At the age of twenty-four he met Maria Tarantino, who soon became his wife and gave him two children. The wife was the artist's favorite model, until old age. 
The artist was active in the Second World War as an officer and was seriously injured during a bombing. 

Since he was a child he showed remarkable powers of observation and a strong sense of form and color. 
The painter was self-taught (although he was later awarded the title of honorary academy by the Academy of Fine Arts of Naples , but he was strongly influenced by the magic of French Impressionism and the influence of the painters Antonio Mancini and Vincenzo Irolli.
The artist scored remarkable successes in various exhibitions in Italy and abroad and his signature is included in the Comanducci.

The artist scored remarkable successes in various exhibitions in Italy and abroad and his signature is included in the Comanducci.

fields.Keterangan: Nasjah (baca : Nasyah) Djamin tak hanya dikenal sebagai pelukis dengan gaya dan warna pastelnya yang khas. Tapi juga dikenal sebagai sastrawan. “Kadang buku cerita saya lebih menarik dari lukisan saya,” katanya. Buku Nasjah memang bermutu, sehingga mendapat hadiah dari BMKN (Badan Permusyawaratan Kebudayaan Nasional) pada 1952 dan 1958. Walau dalam kenyataannya lukisan Nasjah terbilang kolektibel selama tiga dasawarsa. Ia dilahirkan di Perbaungan, Deli, Sumatera Utara, 1924. Belajar melukis kepada Sudjojono, Kartono Yudhokusumo dan Affandi. Pada tahun 1946 ia bergabung dalam Studio Pasukan Obor, untuk membuat poster-poster propaganda anti Belanda. Ia juga bergabung dalam SIM (Seniman Indonesia Muda). Meninggal di Yogyakarta pada 1997.

Namanya sering ditulis dengan Jim Pandy. Sementara ia bernama lengkap James Clearance Pandy. Lelaki berdarah Manado, Sulawesi Utara ini lahir pada 1916 dan wafat pada 1982 di Bali. Pada awalnya ia bekerja sebagai pemandu wisata untuk biro Thomas Cook, yang melayani turis internasional. Setelah Perang Dunia I usai ia  menjadi pengelola toko seni di Pantai Sanur, dengan meanfaatkan pengalamannya sebagai pengelola biro wisata. Toko seni ini menjadi Galeri Pandy pada 1952, atas dukungan Presden Sukarno, yang ingin menjadikan Pantai Sanur sebagai pusat elatase budaya di Bali. Pergaulannya dengan seni lukis menyebabkan ikut melukis. Hasilnya bagus, sehingga beberapa menjadi koleksi Presiden Sukarno.
fields.Description:
James (Jimmy) Clarence Pandy was an Dutch citizen of mixed descent, born in Java. He was a painter, art dealer, connoisseur and promoter of the Balinese arts and cuisine. Save for a few scattered villas owned by lords and heiresses, during the thirties Sanur beach was left in seclusion. Pandy’s Art Gallery was then an aquarium and coffee shop. He became the most noted antique dealer in Bali after World War II, and ran an art gallery and a beachside museum. He had an elegant house with extensive gardens and a guest pavillion with gilded dragons, lions and garuda birds.

In 1956, Pandy met the Dutch painter, Arie Smit, at an exhibition of Balinese art in Jakarta and Pandy had insisted: "You must come to Bali. I've got a place for you to stay." So when Smit arrived in Sanur, there was a room waiting for him in a little house on stilts at the beach. Pandy and Smit became good friends, and for 16 years Pandy sold the works of Arie Smit through his gallery. It was a successful partnership. Pandy had many friends in high places and Sukarno himself would bring his state guests to the small gallery.

fields.Keterangan: Willem Edouard Halewijn dikenal sebagai pelukis Belanda yang kemudian bermukim di Belgia. Namun ia sesungguhnya lahir di Yogyakarta pada 1927, dan sering mengaku sebagai orang Jawa. Berguru melukis kepada T.Goedvriend pada 1940-an. Dan berhenti ketika Jepang menguasai Indonesia pada 1942, karena Halewijn ditangkap dan dimasukkan dalam penjara. Ketika Indonesia merdeka tahun 1945 ia ke Belanda, untuk kemudian balik lagi ke Indonesia pada 1948. Ia suka melukis alam lingkungan dan figur-figur Indonesia. Kecintaannya kepada Indonesia ia formulasikan dalam banyak lukisan yang dipamerkan secara khusus. Bahkan pernah menjadi tema koleksi museumnya yang berdiri di Limburg, Belanda.

fields.Keterangan:
Born on March 24, 1922 in the village of Zavalino, Kolchuginsky District, Vladimir Region.
Father - Semenyuk Ivan Illarionovich (1888-1968). Mother - Semenyuk (Vasilyeva) Elizaveta
Petrovna (1892–1974). Wife - Semenyuk (Zolkina) Olga Vasilyevna. Daughter - Ilyicheva
Tatiana Y.
Yuri spent his childhood and youth in the Vladimir region, ten miles from the county town of
Kolchugin - in beautiful Russian lands, the charm of which he had absorbed from an early
age.
The father, the descendant of Russian Cossacks-Zaporozhtsy, worked as an agronomist. I was
at home a little short. The care of the children and the household lay on the shoulders of the
mother, whose Yura was the fifth child, and for 8 years after his birth the family had 2 more
daughters and 2 sons.
In Vladimir, where his father was transferred to work, soon, as elsewhere, it was a difficult
time for repression. They have not bypassed the Semenyuk family with many children. At
night, my father was raised out of bed and taken away in a “funnel”. Later came the news
from Ivanovo transfer prison. From there, the father was transported to Kazakhstan - there
was created a giant state farm, for the construction of which more than 3 thousand prisoners
were driven from all over the country.

fields.Keterangan: Huỳnh Văn Thuận was born in Saigon on 18 April 1921, into a family with no arts tradition. After passing the entrance exam, Thuận moved to Hanoi in 1939 and joined the 13th intake of the École des Beaux-Arts de l’Indochine. He graduated in 1944 and soon joined the resistance movement against the French, producing propaganda art works to support the Việt Minh. In 1953, along with artists Lê Phả and Bùi Trang Chước, Thuận worked for the State Bank of Vietnam and created the first portraits of Hồ Chí Minh for the country’s new banknotes. After war ended in 1975, and having spent 30 years in the north of Vietnam, Thuận returned to Saigon – newly renamed as Ho Chi Minh City – and became Chief of the Southern Department of Fine Arts.

fields.Keterangan: Bernama lengkap Siti Roelijati. Dilahirkan di Jombang, Jawa Timur, pada 1930. Menempuh pendidikan seni di Akademi Seni Rupa Indonesia Yogyakarta. Selain aktif berpameran, ia juga dikenal sebagai pendidik seni. Pada tahun 1957 ia mulai mengajar, terutama kepada kaum perempuan yang ingin bergumul dengan seni rupa. Itu sebabnya pada 1994 ia mendapat penghargaan Krida Wanodya untuk bidang seni rupa dari Menteri Negara Urusan Perana Wanita, Mien Sugandhi. Lukisan cat minyak dan cat airnya ada dalam koleksi Presiden Sukarno dan Adam Malik. Pelukis yang aktif membuat sketsa ini menikah dengan kritikus seni Dan Suwaryono.
No detailed information available

Berber was born in Bosanski Petrovac, Kingdom of Yugoslavia.[2] He trained at the Academy of Fine Arts in Ljubljana where he graduated with a BA and MA.[3] In 1978, Berber received a teaching position at the Academy of Fine Arts in Sarajevo. 

Today Berber is one of the best known graphic artists in the world. He was included in the Tate Gallery collection in 1984.

Throughout his career he created cycles of paintings which chronicle events, homages and dedications. Each cycle has its roots in Bosnian-Herzegovinian history from the medieval to the twentieth century. His works are characterised by the intermingling of ancient motifs with a more modern commentary, captivating in their iconic mystery and intensity. His surfaces are as complex as his subjects, combining techniques from various times and places while maintaining an aesthetic and allure that has drawn collectors for the past 40 years.[2]

Berber was occupied with painting, graphic art, tapestry, illustrating and preparing bibliographic editions, graphic and poetic maps. His scenography and costume design came to life in theatres in Ljubljana, Zagreb, Sarajevo and Washington. In 1985 Berber finished Tempo Secondo, his own animated cartoon.

From 1992 until his death in October 2012 Berber resided and worked in both Zagreb and Dubrovnik.

fields.Keterangan: Lahir tahun 1904 dan wafat pada 1965. Belajar melukis dari berbagai buku. Namun di kemudian hari ia belajar kepada Affandi. Bahkan sebagai sahabat, Kwie Bing juga mencarikan pasar untuk lukisan-lukisan Affandi. Oleh sejarah Kwie Bing dsebut sebagai salah satu ekponen menonjol dalam pergerakan seni lukis Tionghoa di Indonesia, selain Siauw Tik Kwie dan Lim Wasim. Pada 1955 ia mendirikan perkumpulan pelukis Tionghoa Mung May di Malang, Jawa Timur, sebagai pendamping perkumpulan Yin Hua, yang didirikan Lee Man Fong di Jakarta.

Georg Rueter (bukan : Geng Rueter)
Bernama lengkap Wilhelm Christian Georg. Ia dilahirkan di Haarlem, Belanda 1875, dan meninggal di Amsterdam 1966. Georg Rueter dikenal sebagai penggambar, ahli seni grafik, pelukis, dan desainer benda produksi. Itu sebabnya ia secara profesional ia mengerjakan desain perangko sampai seni kaca patri (stained glass). Pendidikan seni rupa ia tempuh di Tekenschool voor Kunstambachten, Rijksnormaalschool dan Rijksacademie, yang semuanya di Amterdam. Karya posternya yang berilustrasi sosok gadis Jawa mengangkat namanya menjadi terkenal di Hindia Belanda

was a Polish painter noted for producing large historical, battle-piece, and Christian religious panoramas. He was also illustrator and poet. Known also as a great patriotic speaker - his speeches were printed in 1915 under the French title L'ame de la Pologne (The Soul of Poland).

The son of a Czech officer in Austria-Hungary, Styka attended school in his native Lwów (Lemberg, now Lviv) then studied at the Academy of Fine Arts in Vienna, Austria following which he took up residence in Kraków in 1882 where he studied historical painting under Jan Matejko. Next he came back to Lwów and opened there a workshop. Here, together with a celebrated Polish historical painter Wojciech Kossak, they created his most famous work in Poland – The Racławice Panorama. Later he travelled to Italy for a short time before moving to France where the great art movements at Montmartre and Montparnasse were taking shape and where he would spend a large part of his life.

fields.Keterangan: Dilahirkan di Mojoagung, Jawa Timur 1931. Pada hari tuanya ia dikenal sebagai seniman yang mengabdi penuh kepada gereja, dengan gubahannya tentang kehidupan Yesus. Ia pandai melukis potret, sehngga pada 1948 masyarakat India di Indonesia memesan secara khusus lukisan Jawaharal Nehru (Perdana Menteri India) kepadanya, Tahun 1962 ia memperdalam seni lukis ke beberapa negara Eropa. Sejumlah pameran tunggal telah ia selenggarakan di Jakarta dan Singapura, dengan tema kehidupan rakyat jelata. Tentu sambl menghadirkan lukisan potret tokoh dan Yesus.

Menurut Lexicon Foreign Artists Who Visualized Indonesia 1960-1950, pelukis ini mulai aktif pada 1950-an. Banyak melukis tentang kedidupan di Jawa dan Bali. Kedekatan dan penghayatannya atas obyek menyebabkan Presiden Sukarno tertarik. Ia kadang enulis namanya dengan Ravenswaay, seperti kebiasaan ejaan Belanda.
Ravenswaaij yang ini tentulah berbeda dengan Alexander Theodorus van Ravenswaaij, seorang pelukis Hindia Belanda kelahiran Sukabumi 1922, yang lebih dikenal di Amsterdam. Namun diyakini J. Van Ravenswaaij adalah saudaranya.

Lahir di Bogor. Nama lengkapnya Satriya Djuprijani. Ia belajar sekaligus menjadi anak angkat pelukis pemandangan Ernest Dezentjé, sejak 1945. Oleh karenanya itu, ia juga dikenal dengan sebutan Ernest Djuprijani atau Djoprijany. Karya-karyanya bergaya impresionistik. Pada 1956, ia mengikuti lomba lukis di Jakarta dengan tajuk Bunga Mawar dan meraih hadiah pertama. Lukisannya dikoleksi oleh Presiden Sukarno, Presiden Soeharto, serta Museum Kastell Genhoes Oud Valkenburg, Belanda. Pada 1960 ia berpameran di Kedutaan Argentina, Jakarta.

De Kat was a driving force behind the Kennemer Kunstenaarskring. After the war, he and Kees Verwey founded the Hollandse Aquarellistenkring and De Kat remained its chairman until after 1965. He moved to Bloemendaal and became a good friend of Godfried Bomans, helping him found the Teisterbant club. De Kat became a member of Arti et Amicitiae where he won the Arti Medal in 1969. Ten years later, in 1979, he received the Jeanne Oosting Prize.

He was an art critic for the newspaper Haarlems Dagblad in the years 1951-1955 and wrote for Het Vrije Volk.[1] After 1955 he became a teacher at the Amsterdam Rijksakademie, where he would be a tutor for many artists until 1972. His relationship with Hans van Zijl came to an end, just before she died in 1963. De Kat moved to Amsterdam and remarried in 1964 with Danish artist Dora Dahl-Madsen. The couple spent a lot of time in their second house in France, an inspiring environment for De Kat. Due to health issues they left Amsterdam in 1992 and moved to Laren. He died there, at the age of 88

fields.Keterangan:
was a French artist, known for both his use of colour and his fluid and original draughtsmanship. He was a draughtsman, printmaker, and sculptor, but is known primarily as a painter.Matisse is commonly regarded, along with Pablo Picasso, as one of the artists who best helped to define the revolutionary developments in the visual arts throughout the opening decades of the twentieth century, responsible for significant developments in painting and sculpture.

The intense colorism of the works he painted between 1900 and 1905 brought him notoriety as one of the Fauves (wild beasts). Many of his finest works were created in the decade or so after 1906, when he developed a rigorous style that emphasized flattened forms and decorative pattern. In 1917 he relocated to a suburb of Nice on the French Riviera, and the more relaxed style of his work during the 1920s gained him critical acclaim as an upholder of the classical tradition in French painting.[6] After 1930, he adopted a bolder simplification of form. When ill health in his final years prevented him from painting, he created an important body of work in the medium of cut paper collage.

His mastery of the expressive language of colour and drawing, displayed in a body of work spanning over a half-century, won him recognition as a leading figure in modern art.

fields.Keterangan: Pelukis Bali ternama ini dilahirkan di Pengosekan. Ubud, Bali 1917. Sejak kecil prestasi seni lukisnya menakjubkan sejak berusia muda, sehingga ia menerma penghargaan Wija Kesuma 1977 dari Kabupaten Gianyar dan Dharma Kusuma 1981, dari Pemerintah Daerah Bali. Juga dari lembaga Modhara Mandara Giri Bhuwana. Kobot dikenal sebagai salah satu tokoh dalam pekumpulan Pita Maha, yang didirikan oleh Rudolf Bonnet, Walter Spies serta Tjokorda Gde Agung Sukawati, 1936.  Hampir semua museum seni lukis Bali memajang karyanya sebagai kebangaan utama. Kobot banyak melukis tema mitologi dan jagad wayang Rmayana dan Mahabharata.
Merupakan pelukis yang secara konsisten melukiskan alam swiss. komposisi karya terdiri dari gunung dan glesier serta seringkali menggambarkan suasana musim dingin

Lahir pada tahun 1919. Sejak usia belia ia sudah terlibat kegiatan melukis di Balai Kebudayaan, yang terletak di Pasar Legi, Solo. Pada masa revolusi ia banyak membuat catatan visual perjuangan rakyat. Pada 1955 ia pameran bersama kelompok “Seni Rupa Angkatan Perang”. Sebagai perempuan yang harus mengurus rumah tangga, ia tak henti melukis dan berpameran sampai kurun 1990-an. Ia pun menggerakkan kegiatan melukis di Persatuan Isteri Teknisi Veteran. Kemudian bergabung dalam Ikatan Pelukis Wanita Indonesia, dan mengikuti berbagai kegiatan pameran. Ia wafat sebelum tahun 2000.

Seniman lukis kelahiran Cangkuang, Bandung, Jawa Barat, 19 Agustus 1936 ini merajut karirnya sejak masa remaja. Selama lebih dari 40 tahun berkarya secara produktif dengan karya yang tak terhitung jumlahnya. Tatang, adalah anak keluarga petani. Djana, ayahnya, selain mencangkul, juga senang menari dan melukis di atas kaca. Mengusung tema wayang dan alam benda lainnya. Dari sini sudah dapat diketahui darah seni sang ayah mengaliri tubuh anaknya.  
 
Tatang Ganar, yang dialiri darah seni orang tuanya terus melaju kedepan untuk mencapai cita-citanya menjadi pelukis. Terlebih setelah ia menyaksikan pameran besar lukisan karya para maestro seni lukis di gedung Yayasan Pusat Kebudayaan di jalan Naripan, Bandung. Diantara pelukis kondang yang ikut pameran itu antara lain Affandi, Hendra Gunawan, Soedarso, Sapto Hoedojo. Sejak itu hasrat Tatang kian menggebu ingin jadi melukis tenar.  
 
Setamat SMA di Bandung, Tatang kabur ke Yogyakarta berguru para pelukis kondang yang ia temui dan bergabung dengan pelukis rakyat (LEKRA). Sebuah organisasi seniman yang waktu itu paling popular dan prestisius. Dari sanalah Tatang banyak belajar dan menyerap ilmu kesenirupaan. Pergaulannya dengan para seniman Yogyakarta banyak memberikan manfaat terutama bagi perkembangannya selama ini untuk memantapkan dirinya menjadi pelukis profesional.

Ia bernama lengkap Charles Eugene Henri Sayers. Lahir di Kendal, Jawa Tengah, 1901. Setelah hidup nyaman di Jawa ia menempuh pendidikan seni di Rijksacademie Amsterdam, dan diteruskan ke Academie des Beaux Arts di Paris. Seusai studi ia balik ke Jawa pada 1927. Kemudian mmelncong lagi ke Paris, sampai akhirnya bisa mengikut perhelatan International Colonual Exhibition, 1931. Di sini lukisannya ikut dipamerkan bersama karya Raden Saleh, L.Eland dan sebagainya. Ketika ruang pameran Hindia Belanda terbakar, lukisan Sayers juga ikut menjadi abu. Ia banyak melukis alam dan figurasi Indonesia. Karyanya beberapa kali dipamerkan oleh Bataviasche Kunstkring. Ia meninggal di Thambyazajat, Siam, pada 1943.
fields.Description:
Charles Sayers was born in Gemuh, Central Java, in 1901. From 1920 until 1923, Sayers attends the Royal Academy of Fine Arts in Amsterdam, among Derkinderen, Jurres and van der Waay. Following his education, he spends 4 years in Paris, before returning to Java. From 1932 until 1934, Sayers lives in Bali. In 1939, Sayers and his wife and daughter move to North Sumatra.
During Japanese occupation of Indonesia, Sayres was forced to work on the Burma Railway, and in 1943 tragically dies from malaria and malnutrition, at the age of 42.

fields.Keterangan:
He was born in Wakayama city in Wakayama Prefecture. He moved to Tokyo in 1895. Initially interested in literature, he studied under the poet Kawabata Hoja, who introduced him to the Hototogisu artistic circle. He then became interested in painting instead, and studied yōga painting techniques as an apprentice in the studios of the Hakubakai. When he was 18, he entered a Yomiuri Shimbun illustration contest, from which his work was selected. He continued working on newspaper illustrations to earn a living as he studied oil painting. In 1913, he traveled to the United States to study western-style painting techniques in more depth, but was so impressed with the Japanese art that he saw during a visit to the Boston Museum of Fine Arts that he switched to the Nihonga genre on his return to Japan in 1914, displaying at the Inten Exhibition in 1915. He left Inten in 1928 in protest of its increasing rigid rules, and established his own Nihonga art circle, the Seiryusha in 1928. The Seiryusha held an exhibition on competition to the Inten twice a year from 1929 to 1965 in Tokyo. In addition, Ryūshi usually held a personal exhibition in Osaka once per year.

Ryūshi was a major advocate of Art for the Exhibition Place (会場芸術 kaijo geijutsu), which emphasized the public nature of art. His works therefore tended to be on a huge scale, and were intended for public display in large areas.

After World War II, together with Yokoyama Taikan and Kawai Gyokudō, he came to be regarded as one the "Three Big Figures" in the field of Nihonga painting.

He left Inten in 1928 in protest of its increasing rigid rules, and established his own Nihonga art circle, the Seiryusha in 1928. The Seiryusha held an exhibition on competition to the Inten twice a year from 1929 to 1965 in Tokyo. In addition, Ryūshi usually held a personal exhibition in Osaka once per year.

Ryūshi was a major advocate of Art for the Exhibition Place (会場芸術 kaijo geijutsu), which emphasized the public nature of art. His works therefore tended to be on a huge scale, and were intended for public display in large areas.

After World War II, together with Yokoyama Taikan and Kawai Gyokudō, he came to be regarded as one the "Three Big Figures" in the field of Nihonga painting.

fields.Keterangan:
Liem Tjoe Ing was an Indonesian artist of Hokkien Chinese ancestry. He was born in Surukarta (Solo) in central Java in 1922 and died in 1999 in Jakarta. As well as being an artist he was also the compiler of the published catalogue of the painting collection of Adam Malik, Indonesia’s third vice president and former foreign minister.

Liem’s style is highly impressionist. In this regard, he seems to have been influenced by several European artists who painted in Indonesia, including Gerard Pieter Adolfs, Roland Strasser, and Adrien-Jean Le Mayeur. Like many of his contemporaries, he painted scenes set in Bali, the Hindu island

fields.Keterangan: Batara Lubis Lahir di Huta Godang, Ulu Pungkut, Mandailing Natal 1 Desember 1986 (umur 59) adalah Seorang Pelukis yang mempunyai karakter dengan corak warna yang kontras. Ia hijrah dari Medan dan menetap di Yogyakarta belajar ilmu Seni Lukis.Ia adalah Anak dari mantan Gubernur Sumatra Utara Raja Djundjungan Lubis.

Dilahirkan di Bukit Tinggi, Sumatera Barat, 1928. Wafat di Jakarta dalam usia tua. Ia adalah putera dari pelukis terkenal, Wakidi. Pada awalnya Agoes mengembangkan karirnya di kampung halaman. Namun karena di Jawa dianggap lebih memiliki peluang, ia berhasrat pindah ke Yogyakarta dan Bali. Walau akhirnya ia menetap di Jakarta. Karyanya yang bertema panorama Sumatera Barat sering diikutkan dalam berbagai pameran. Di antaranya di Galeri Andy dalam sebuah pameran khusus.
fields.Description: No detailed information available.

fields.Keterangan: Leon William Hanson adalah seorang pelukis Australia berdarah campuran Norwegia dan Spanyol. Ia belajar melukis secara otodidak. Setelah Perang Dunia II, ia mulai melukis penuh waktu dan sempat berpameran di berbagai ibukota negara bagian Australia.
fields.Description:
Born in 1918 of Norwegian and Spanish parents, Leon William Hanson studied privately. He has painted full time since World War II, holding exhibitions in all state capitals. One of his drawings is in the Art Gallery of New South Wales.

R. Parsons is a pseudonym used by Leon Hansen, and works under this signature are listed separately.

fields.Keterangan:
Matsubayashi Keigetsu ( Japanese 松林桂月 ; born 18th August 1876 in Hagi ( Yamaguchi Prefecture ); d. 22. May 1963 ) was a Japanese painter in Nanga style during the Meiji , Taisho and early Showa period .

Matsubayashi was born as Itō Atsushi ( 伊藤 篤 ). Promoted by a bank director in his area he could go to Tōkyō. There he studied painting from 1894 under Noguchi Yūkoku ( 野 口 幽谷 , 1825-1898). He developed, influenced by the Meiji period, the style of Nanga painting in some decorative direction, with his academic education something in contradiction to the original principles of this art direction.

In 1896 Matsubayashi and others founded the Nihon Nanshū Gakai Artists' Association ( 日本 南宗 画 会 ). He exhibited in the exhibition series of the Ministry of Culture, called "Bunten" ( 文 展 ) for short , and in the successor organizations "Teiten" ( 帝 展 ) and "Nitten" ( 日 展 ). [A 1]

In 1919 he became Juror der Teiten, 1932 member of the Japanese Academy of Arts and in 1944 he became an "artist at the imperial court" ( 帝室 技 芸 員 , Teishitsu gigei-in ). In 1958 Matsubayashi received the Japanese Cultural Order . In 1961, Matsubayashi became president of Nihon Nanga-in ( 本 南 画院 ), the successor to Nanshu Gakai.

fields.Keterangan: Nama lengkapnya adalah Anna Maria (Annemarie) Blaupot Ten Cate. Lahir di Haskerland, Belanda, 1902. Bersekolah seni di Rijksacademie Den Haag. Mendapat arahan melukis dari J.H. Gerlings di Arnhem serta A.Lhote dan M.Blanchard di Paris, yang dianggap memberikan warna dalam karirnya. Pada awal 1930-an suaminya, Fontainaille, bertugas di Hindia Belanda, dan Annie menyertainya. Setelah Perang Dunia II ia hidup di Amsterdam sebagai pelukis cat air dan desainer. Lukisannya yang figuratif beberapa kali dipamerkan di Bataviasche Kunstkring.
fields.Description: No detailed information available.

fields.Keterangan: Widayat lahir pada tahun 1919 di Kutoarjo, Jawa Tengah. Ibunya adalah seorang pembatik. Ia akrab dengan dunia lukisan sejak kecil. Setelah tamat HIS (Hollandsche Inlandsce School) di Trenggalek pada tahun 1937, ia melanjutkan ke sekolah menengah kejuruan di Bandung, di mana ia bertemu dengan pelukis Mulyono dan berguru padanya setiap minggu. Ia kemudian pindah ke Palembang dan bekerja sebagai juru ukur pegawai kehutanan dan juru gambar peta rel kereta api Palembang. Pada tahun 1945, ia bergabung dengan PMC (Penerangan Militer Chusus) dengan pangkat Letnan Satu, dan selajutnya bergabung dengan divisi Garuda Sumatera Selatan sebagai Pimpinan Seksi Penerangan. Keterlibatannya dalam militer membuatnya dapat berkarya lukis melalui publikasi poster perjuangan. Lima tahun setelahnya, ia menjadi mahasiswa ASRI (Akademi Seni Rupa Indonesia) dan mendirikan PIM (Pelukis Indonesia Muda) bersama rekan-rekan seangkatannya, antara lain Sayoga, G. Sidharta, Murtihadi, dan Suhendra. Ia juga berkesempatan mengajar di ASRI dan memperdalam ilmunya dalam bidang seni keramik, ikebana, pertamanan dan grafis ke Jepang. Sekembalinya ke Indonesia, ia ditunjuk sebagai Ketua Jurusan Seni Dekorasi selama 21 tahun dan terus bereksplorasi dengan berbagai media. Ia kerap mendirikan museum pribadinya pada tahun 1994 di kota Mungkid, Kabupaten Magelang, Jawa Tengah.

Bernama asli Mori Kichigoro. Namun untuk meluweskan pergaulan di Hindia Belanda, ia merubah namanya dengan Mori Kinsen. Dalam lukisannya ia menuliskan dengan K.Mori. Lahir di Yokohama 1988. Datang ke Hindia Belanda tahun 1914. Pada kurun pertama ia memilih hidup di Surabaya, kemudian pindah ke Wonosobo pada tahun 1940-an, dan lantas menetap lama di Ambarawa, Jawa Tengah. Bergaul erat dengan Walter Spies dan Art Jo Konig. Ketika Jepang menjajah Indonesia pada 1942-1945 ia bekerja sebagai penerjemah. Pada era ini ia mulai mengenal Sukarno. Tahun 1949 ia kembali ke Jepang. Tahun 1956 ia balik lagi ke Indonesia, sampai meninggal di Magelang pada 1959.

Dilahirkan di Banjar Tebesaya, desa Peliatan, Ubud, Bali, 1935. Meninggal pada 1986. Bakat seninya diwarisi dari ayahnya, I Wayan Dugdug yang dikenal sebagai pengukir kayu handal. Lalu ia beLajar melukis secara formal di sekolah seni lukis di Peliatan yang dipimpin oleh I Gusti Ketut Kobot, sejak 1948. Ia juga pernah belajar kepada pelukis terkenal I Dewa Ketut Ding dan Ida Bagus Wiri. Pada 1956 ia bergabung dalam perkumpulan Golongan Pelukis Ubud pimpinan Rudolf Bonnet. Pada masa itulah ia semakin dekat dengan corak lukisan yang berwarna. Semula karya Turun memang cenderung hitam-putih saja.
No detailed information available.
fields.Description: No detailed information available.

fields.Keterangan: Bernama lengkap Charles Prosper Wolff Schoemaker. Ia dilahirkan di Banyubiru, Jawa Tengah 1882. Dikenal sebagai arsitek bercorak Art Deco di berbagai kota di Indonesia. Ketika muda ia menetap di Bandung dan mengajar seni arsitektur di sebuah perguruan tinggi, yang kelak bernama Institut Teknologi Bandung atau ITB. Di perguruan ini ia bersama Ries Mulder mendorong lahirnya jurusan seni rupa. Ia juga gemar melukis, dan bahkan paling suka memberikan dorongan kepada para seniman Indonesa untuk menjadi pelukis profesional. Bersahabat dengan Sukarno sejak sebelum kemerdekaan. Lukisannya sering dipamerkan kunsktkring di Bandung dan Jakarta. Wolff dikenal sebagai seorang nasionalis yang mencintai Indonesia. Ia wafat pada bulan Mei di Bandung.
fields.Description:
In 1905, he returned to the Dutch East Indies to work for the Royal Dutch East Indies Army as a military engineer. After leaving the job in 1911, he became the engineer for the Department of Civil Public Works in Batavia (present-day Jakarta), and became the Director of Public Works in 1914. From 1917 to 1918, he worked for Fa. Schlieper & Co and took a study trip to the United States with the organization,where he came into contact with the work of Frank Lloyd Wright.
In 1918, in partnership with his brother Richard, Schoemaker established the architectural firm C.P. Schoemaker and Associates in Bandung. His firm blended traditional Indonesian architecture with modern European styles, incorporating traditional elements into the shapes and layouts of the buildings. Wolff Schoemaker deliberately applied a functionalist approach to his buildings. Among his most notable buildings were the Sociëteit Concordia building on Braga Street (1921), where the Asian–African Conference was held in 1955 (today known as Gedung Merdeka), the Hotel Preanger (1929), the Pasteur Institute of Indonesia, the St. Peter Cathedral, and Villa Isola (1932), all located in Bandung.

fields.Keterangan: Nhek Dim menempuh pendidikan di School of Cambodian Art di Phnom Penh pada 1949 dan belajar melukis dari seniman asal Kamboja dan Jepang. Tahun 1957 ia pernah dikirim ke Filipina untuk menggambar dan menerbitkan buku bersama seniman-seniman asal Asia. Pada 1961 ia berpameran di Khmer Sport Center. Karya-karyanya melukiskan pemandangan pedesaan Kamboja dengan pendekatan modern, suatu pendekatan yang belum lazim ditemui pada saat itu. Tahun 1963 Nhek Dim berangkat ke Amerika Serikat untuk mempelajari pembuatan film kartun. Nhek Dim juga dikenal di kalangan istana Kamboja. Ia sempat membuat ilustrasi dari lagu-lagu yang diciptakan Raja Sihanouk. Nhek Dim merupakan satu dari seniman dan intelektual yang menjadi korban pergolakan politik Kamboja di era 1970an yang diperkirakan menghapus hingga 90% komunitas seni dan intelektual.

He was born in Kanda district of Tokyo to an affluent and literate family. His father was the founder and president of the Tokyo Nichi Nichi Shimbun newspaper, and a writer of popular novels. In 1891, young Kaburagi was sent to become a disciple of ukiyo-e artists Mizuno Toshikata and Taiso Yoshitoshi when he was 13 years old. His first job was as an illustrator for Yamato Shinbun, a Tokyo newspaper founded by his father. When he was sixteen, his father went bankrupt and the family had to sell their home.
Kaburagi initially made his living as an illustrator, producing frontispieces called kuchi-e, illustrating the titles of popular novels. His works were highly praised by noted author Kyōka Izumi, who insisted that his novels be illustrated by Kaburagi. However, Kaburagi's first and foremost interest was in painting. In 1901, he helped create the Ugokai (烏合会), an art group dedicated to reviving and popularizing the bijin-ga (images of beautiful women) genre. When the government-sponsored Bunten exhibitions were started in 1907, Kaburagi began to paint full-time, winning several prizes.

In 1915, his work Murasame won first prize at the 9th Bunten Exhibition.

fields.Keterangan:
Carmelo had the distinction of being the first Filipino to fly solo on a plane in the Philippines and of holding the No. 1 pilot certificate from the first aviation school in the country.
After attending the Ateneo de Manila and San Beda College, he was sent by his father to Germany in 1914 to learn all about lithography, the family business. While there, he took an interest in flying among his circle of friends, who were mostly pilots. While in Leipzig, he religiously attended the weekend air shows and observed the great German pilots display difficult maneuvers. This developed in him an enthusiasm for air stunts. He was supposed to enroll at the famous Linthenthal Flug Schule at Hale but his plans were thwarted by the eruption of the First World War which made him to come home by his family.
By the time he returned, the Americans had already opened an aviation school in the country. He enrolled at the Curtiss Aviation School, becoming one of the six members of its first class in aviation under pilot Alfred Croft. Flying meant so much to Carmelo that he bought his own Curtiss JN-4D so he could have a plane at his disposal. On January 9, 1920, he piloted his seagull plane alone, making two flights over Manila Bay and Cavite. He thus earned the honor of being the first Filipino aviator.
As an acrobatic pilot, he participated in both local and international air shows, thrilling thousands of spectators with his well-executed stunts and high-flying maneuvers. He also won countless trophies and awards for his exceptional ability. In 1954, he received the Clarkins trophy as the most outstanding pilot of the year. During the 36th anniversary celebration of the Philippine Air Force, he was one of two recipients of the commanding general’s cup, the other one being Capt. Carlos A. Barretto, director of the prewar Philippine Air Service. He was nominated to the Aerospace Hall of Fame in San Diego, California for his outstanding contributions to the development of Philippine aviation and local air power. Even at an old age, Carmelo still took part in air shows during the annual observance of Philippine Aviation Week. His last public performance was in 1976.
Carmelo actually didn’t make a career of daredevil flying. A successful businessman, he ran the famous printing firm his father founded. He was its president in 1938. At one time, he also served as honorary consul for Mexico in the Philippines.
In later years, he devoted his time to painting, mounting one-man exhibits locally and abroad. Carmelo was married to the former Elvira Ullman in Manila in 1917. He sired five daughters. He died on August 26, 1985 and was buried at the Loyola Memorial Park in Parañaque.

fields.Keterangan: Selama menekuni studi seni rupa di Akademi San Carlos, Ignacio Beteta dikenal sebagai seorang murid yang menonjol. Meskipun demikian, ia meninggalkan studinya untuk bergabung dengan Tentara Konstitusional, di mana ia diangkat menjadi Mayor Jenderal di Angkatan Darat Meksiko. Ia melanjutkan studinya dalam bidang seni pada tahun 1929 dan banyak melukiskan pemandangan Eropa, Amerika dan Asia dalam karya-karyanya yang beraliran impresionistik.
fields.Description: Beteta was born in Toluca, Mexico and his works are now part of the Museo de la Acuarela in one of the oldest buildings in Toluca known as El Gallito. At first he wanted to become an architect, but when the Mexican Revolution started, he enlisted in the military where he climbed to the rank of General. In one of his battles he got to meet David Alfaro Siqueiros. This meeting might as well have been prophetic for after the Revolution he started to express himseld through painting. He studied at the famed Academia San Carlos and met great Mexican Masters like Diego Rivera and Dr. Atl who became great influences in his work.

fields.Keterangan:
Shiavax Chavda was a masterful interpreter of ancient Indian art forms and his sympathy with its subjects, whether human, animal or architectural and his ability to enter their souls with a few deft strokes is considered the hallmark of his work.

His ability to capture the life force, the movements, even their muscular structure or their body structures with a few simplified strokes is what makes him stand apart.

Born in 1914 in Navsari Gujarat, Chavda joined the Sir J.J. School of Art, Mumbai in 1930. In 1935 he went to London where he studied at the Slade School under Professor Randolph. In 1937, he continued his studies at the Academie de la Grande Chaumiere, Paris. While in Paris, he worked alongside Leon Bakst and Picasso in designing the sets for the Diaghelev Ballet. 

He travelled extensively through the length and breadth of India to understand his subjects. Indian temples, the ancient art traditions, rural life, the sacredness of art, all formed the basis for his unique style. Chavda's style evolved from the early realistic portrayals to depiction of the personality and character of his subjects but the works always remained optimistic and vibrant, though never dramatic. 

He had his first solo exhibition in Mumbai in 1945 and thereafter in Indonesia, Singapore, London, Paris and Switzerland. His works have also been featured in the UNESCO International exhibition (1946) and the Salon de Mai (1951). Between 1956-63, he exhibited with the Bombay Group. 

A retrospective of his work was held at the Jehangir Art Gallery in 1993. Shiavax Chavda died in 1990.

fields.Keterangan:
Jan S. Knikker junior was born in Leiden and was the 3rd painting member of the family Knikker. His father Jan and his brother Aris were his great example and, like him, followers of the art movement “Haagse School”. 
Jan junior has acquired his own style with his village views and skylines of many Dutch villages and cities. 
Occasionally he also painted still lives, and this is a fine example of this.

fields.Keterangan: He studied at the Free School of Nude in Brera and then, for two years, with Adolfo Ferraguti-Visconti, training in the climate of Scapigliatura on the works of Ottavio Ranzoni and Tranquillo Cremona. In 1891 he made his debut at the Permanente in Milan. In 1909 he took part, for the first time, in the Venice Biennale in which he will be present until 1954; in 1911, he exhibited in Munich and was present at the International Exhibition of Rome. His knowledge of Cézanne's 1920s work directs him towards painting

fields.Keterangan: Azis SB (Sutan Buyung) lahir di Padang (Sumatera Barat) pada 1928. Namun demikian ia dikenal sebagai tokoh seni lukis Medan yang aktif tahun 1950-an. Anggota sanggar Angkatan Seni Rupa Indonesia dan Simpassri (Simpaian Seniman Senirupa Indonesia) di Medan. Pada kemudian hari ia dikenal sebaga pelopor seni lukis batik di Medan, dengan gayanya yang khas. Pameran tunggal pertama dilakukan pada 1957 di Toko Sriganda, Medan. Karyanya juga dipamerkan di Singapura, Malaysia sampai Jerman Barat.

Chou adalah pelukis perempuan Tiongkok yang terkenal di Amerika Serikat dan Kanada. Ia lahir di Luling, Tiongkok tahun 1909. Belajar melukis pertama kali dari ayahnya. Kemudian bersentuhan dengan ahli-ahli seni lukis dari akademi seni Shanghai. Sampai pada satu saat lukisannya dipajang sebagai koleksi permanen di museum seni Shanghai. Karya cat airnya memperoleh penghargaan tinggi dalam Vancouver Golden Jubilee Chinese Carnival Kanada 1936, dan Akademi Seni Beijing tahun 1953. Ia juga merenggut National Art First Prize dari Shanghai, 1956. Ia dianggap tokoh dalam Asosiasi Pelukis dan Pencipta Kaligrafi Tiongkok.

Tino Sidin adalah seorang pelukis dan guru gambar yang terkenal dengan acaranya di stasiun TVRI era 80-an, yaitu Gemar Menggambar. Dalam acara ini "Pak Tino" mengajar anak-anak bahwa menggambar itu mudah, dan merupakan perpaduan dari garis-garis lurus dan garis-garis lengkung. Pada akhir setiap acara ia menunjukkan gambar-gambar yang dikirim oleh pemirsanya dan kemudian menambahkan komentar yang sangat dikenal, "Bagus!"

Lydia Brodskaya was born in 1910 in St. Petersburg. Her father - the artist Isaac Brodsky.
In 1921-1928 she studied at the Petrograd Choreographic School. In 1935–1938, she visited
the IZhSA named after I.E. as an auditor. Repin. Since 1940 - in Moscow; worked in the
genre of still life under the guidance of N.M. Krymov (series "Flowers"), then - in the
windows of TASS (1941). Since 1947, was engaged mainly in landscapes. In 1970 -
corresponding member of the USSR Academy of Arts. In 1977 - laureate of the RSFSR
State Prize. I.E. Repin In 1980 - the national artist of the USSR. In 1981 she was awarded
the silver medal of the USSR Academy of Arts. Among the best works of Brodsky are “Land
of the Natives” (1950), “Our Far East” (1970), “Russian Winter”, “Spring” (1961-1967),
“Barguzinsky Reserve” (1962), “Expanses of Spring” (1975 ). Her husband is an artist Fedor
Pavlovich Reshetnikov. She died in 1990 or 1991 in Moscow.
fields.Description:
Lydia Brodskaya was born in 1910 in St. Petersburg. Her father - the artist Isaac Brodsky.
In 1921-1928 she studied at the Petrograd Choreographic School. In 1935–1938, she visited
the IZhSA named after I.E. as an auditor. Repin. Since 1940 - in Moscow; worked in the
genre of still life under the guidance of N.M. Krymov (series "Flowers"), then - in the
windows of TASS (1941). Since 1947, was engaged mainly in landscapes. In 1970 -
corresponding member of the USSR Academy of Arts. In 1977 - laureate of the RSFSR
State Prize. I.E. Repin In 1980 - the national artist of the USSR. In 1981 she was awarded
the silver medal of the USSR Academy of Arts. Among the best works of Brodsky are “Land
of the Natives” (1950), “Our Far East” (1970), “Russian Winter”, “Spring” (1961-1967),
“Barguzinsky Reserve” (1962), “Expanses of Spring” (1975 ). Her husband is an artist Fedor
Pavlovich Reshetnikov. She died in 1990 or 1991 in Moscow.

fields.Keterangan: Olof Jernberg adalah anak dari pelukis August Jernberg. Ia belajar seni di Academy of Dusseldorf dari tahun 1870, dan melanjutkan studi di Eugene Dücker’s School tahun 1875. Ia pindah ke Perancis pada tahun 1880, di mana ia banyak terekspos oleh gaya lukis kelompok Barbizo School. Pada tahun 1897, ia mengajar sebagai professor di Akademi Seni Königsberg dan HBK Berlin. Ia turut mendirikan Berlin Secession dan klub “St. Lucas” serta menjadi anggota dari kolektif “Orient” dan himpunan seniman “Malkasten”. Karya-karya Jernberg banyak mengambil subyek pemandangan darat dan laut, sebelum bereksplorasi dengan figural studies.

was born circa October 31, 1632, in Delft, Netherlands. In 1652, joined the Delft painter’s guild. 
He served as its dean from 1662 to '63, and again from 1669 to '70. His early works include "Girl Asleep at the Table." As his style matured, he painted "Little Street" and "View of Delft." After 1660, Vermeer painted his "pearl pictures," including "The Concert" and "Girl with a Pearl Earring." He died in Delft circa December 16, 1675.

Early Life
Born in Delft, Netherlands, circa October 31, 1632, Johannes Vermeer is one of the most highly regarded Dutch artists of all time. His works have been a source of inspiration and fascination for centuries, but much of his life remains a mystery. His father, Reynier, came from a family of craftsmen in the town of Delft, and his mother, Digna, had a Flemish background.

After his baptismal record at a local church, Vermeer seems to disappear for nearly 20 years. He likely had a Calvinist upbringing. His father worked as a tavern keeper and an art merchant, and Vermeer inherited both of these business upon his father's death in 1652. The following year, Vermeer married Catherina Bolnes. Bolnes was Catholic, and Vermeer converted to her faith. The couple moved in with her mother, and would eventually have 11 children together.

fields.Keterangan: Selepas lulus dari pendidikan dasar pada usia ke-17, Werner Scholz secara sukarela bergabung dengan militer, di mana ia kehilangan lengan bawah kirinya pada tahun. Pengalamannya dalam Perang Dunia I dan penderitaan sosial di kota yang dialaminya setelah perang menjadi inspirasi dalam karya-karya awalnya - kebanyakan bernuansa hitam putih kelam, yang dibuatnya saat bersekolah di Hoschschula der “Bildenden Künste”, Berlin. Saat ia meninggalkan akademi, ia mulai bekerja di studio dan memiliki ketertarikan pada seniman-seniman dari gerakan Die Brücke, antara lain Emil Nolde, yang juga mengagumi karyanya. Pada tahun 1930, karyanya dibeli oleh the Nationalgalerie Berlin dan Wallraf-Richartz Museum di Cologne, serta sempat berpameran di Entartete Kunst pada masa Nazi. Setelah perang usai, karya-karya Scholz banyak mengangkat tema apokaliptik, Perjanjian Lama, mitologi Yunani, dan industrial, namun tetap dengan gaya ekspresionisme Jerman dan melankolinya yang khas, serta bereksplorasi pada subyek manusia, nude, dan pemandangan menjelang akhir hayatnya.

Jewish parents. During World War II, the family immigrated from Nazi-Occupied. Europe to Brazil in 1941,where Mr.Monteiro spent his childhood and developed his studies. Studied Art in Rio De Janeiro and gained Brazilian Citizenship in 1958. In 1964 Mr.Monteiro immigrated to the United States. He became a U.S. citizen in 1972. He lived and worked in New York City.

fields.Keterangan: Ahmad Sadali lahir di Garut, Jawa Barat 24 Juli 1924 dari keluarga yang akrab dengan dunia batik dan cetak-mencetak. Ia mengenyam pendidikan dari kecil, mulai dari Taman kanak-kanak, di HIS, belajar di Madrasah Muhammadiyah, lalu masuk MULO semuanya di Kota Garut. Meneruskan belajar di tingkat SMT-A di Kota Yogyakarta, lalu masuk Sekolah Tinggi Islam Jakarta (1944-45). Ketika tahun 1948, Ahmad Sadali memasuki Fakultas Guru Gambar pada Fakultas Teknik Universitas Indonesia (sekarang FSRD, ITB). Setelah menyelesaikan sekolahnya tahun 1953, Ahmad Sadali langsung diangkat menjadi tenaga pengajar di Fakultas tersebut. Tahun 1956 Sadali melanjutkan kuliah di New York, Amerika Serikat. Hingga akhir hayatnya, perjalanan akademik Ahmad Sadali telah mengukuhkannya sebagai seorang profesor.

Arturo (Antero) Piletti, Son of a railwayman. He graduated from the Academy of Fine Arts of Parma , without having attended it, as the conclusion of an individual activity, tenacious and sincerity to learn arts.

fields.Keterangan:
Marinus (Ries) Mulder (IJsselstein, 1 January 1909 - 19 December 1973) was a Dutch painter. He developed his own cubist style and was a teacher at the academy of visual arts in Indonesia (ITB).
He had a great influence on modern Indonesian painting.
